title: Citi News App Now Available for iPhone
summary: Citi recently announced that the Citi News App is now available for download on iPhone devices, showing again that Citi is the industry leader in providing innovative communication tools. As with the iPad app, the iPhone version delivers a rich and interactive way to view the latest press releases and investor information from Citi. Within the app you'll find:
tag-1: Citi News App Now Available for iPhone
tag-2: Citi recently announced that the Citi News App is now available for download on iPhone devices, showing again that Citi is the industry leader in providing innovative communication tools. As with the iPad app, the iPhone version delivers a rich and interactive way to view the latest press releases and investor information from Citi. Within the app you'll find:
tag-3: The iPhone app launch illustrates Citi's commitment to advancing the digital offerings across all our core businesses. In the coming months, Citi will continue to add features and roll out the Citi News App for other devices and platforms.
tag-4: The free iPhone app is available at the iTunes store.
tag-5: iPhone and iPad are registered trademarks of Apple Inc.
